    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:22.519
    | text      = in on this issue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:24.679

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.480

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = now on Infowars.com.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.200

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:50.639

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:05.159

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:09.919
    | text      = Or opens door to searches without warrants, that's the headline.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.840
    | text      = Dissenting judge calls ruling, or dissenting judges call ruling the road to hell.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.240
    | text      = Oh damn.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:30.240
    | text      = So I understand where Alex is coming from, and maybe on a general philosophical level
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:33.799
    | text      = I can agree with him, but he's repeatedly endorsed stop-and-frisk policing in places
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:38.600
    | text      = like New York, so maybe you can just calm down a little bit with this sanctity bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.320
    | text      = He's on one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:44.639
    | text      = So the situation here is about a case out of Louisiana that was recently decided in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.200
    | text      = the Fifth Circuit of Appeals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.200
    | text      = I'll give you the basic details, because it's a little bit messy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:53.720
    | text      = There was this guy named Kelly Gould, who was a known violent felon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.279
    | text      = A guy who knew him called the police and warned them that Gould was planning on killing two
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:01.539
    | text      = local judges, and naturally the police acted on that tip and decided, let's go have a little
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.399
    | text      = chat with this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.039
    | text      = They arrived at the trailer where Gould lived, and another resident of the trailer gave them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.080
    | text      = permission to enter and look for Gould, who was said to be asleep in his bedroom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:17.080
    | text      = The officers looked in the bedroom, they didn't see him, and part of making sure he wasn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:21.220
    | text      = setting up an ambush was to look around under the bed, check the closets, which are open,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:26.679
    | text      = in the bedroom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:27.720
    | text      = When they did so, they found a bunch of guns, which Gould was not allowed to be in possession
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.360
    | text      = of because he was a violent felon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:33.240
    | text      = On account of the violent felonies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.559
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.559
    | text      = So Gould had managed to get out of the trailer, but police found him hiding in the woods nearby
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.919
    | text      = pretty quick, at which point he was arrested and consented to a search of his living space.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.399
    | text      = Now here's what's at issue with this case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:47.799
    | text      = Did the officers have the right to search those closets, which is to say, was that an
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.919
    | text      = appropriate part of doing a protective sweep of the premises?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.039
    | text      = Gould's lawyers argued that they did not, and they sought to suppress the discovery
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:59.559
    | text      = of the guns as being any evidence that could be used against Gould.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:03.240
    | text      = And the District Court agreed, but on appeal, the Fifth Circuit Court overturned that decision,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.279
    | text      = finding that this kind of protective sweep is appropriate in the context that the officers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:11.940
    | text      = were in, where failing to do so could have put them in serious danger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:16.200
    | text      = The issue was an uncertainty about protective sweeps left hanging after a previous case,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.799
    | text      = Maryland v. Bowie.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.680
    | text      = That case established that protective sweeps were fine for police to do in the context
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.440
    | text      = of an arrest, but it didn't specify that they had to only be incident to an arrest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:33.240
    | text      = That was a potential understanding of the ruling, which was the basis for Gould's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:36.960
    | text      = lawyers' challenge.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.960
    | text      = Ultimately, the Fifth Circuit decided that protective sweeps did not have to only be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:42.119
    | text      = done after or in the context of an arrest, but could be done under other, very limited
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:47.240
    | text      = circumstances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.240
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:49.240
    | text      = This is not a draconian step towards the police state, but Alex is presenting it that way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.559
    | text      = because it involves guns, and that'll sort of become clear as we go on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:56.279
    | text      = I was going to say, yeah, I feel like, again, the real problem here is this is involving
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
